content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI generated an image of a beautiful sunset over the ocean and saved it to disk. The assistant suggested using the 'list_files' command to see what files are in the workspace directory, which I executed. The command returned a list of files in the directory, which includes various river-related files and saved images. I received a command to browse the National Geographic website and find interesting articles."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Some interesting articles on this website include the life of Lexington, vintage photos of historic coronations, how a wild river became a national park, and how Chien-Shiung Wu changed the laws of physics. There are also articles on travel, history, culture, and animals. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/)', ' (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/search)', 'Newsletters (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/newsletters/signup)', 'Subscribe (https://www.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe)', 'Subscribe (https://magazines.nationalgeographic.com/subscribe/latest-stories)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "interesting_articles.txt", "text": "Some interesting articles on this website include the life of Lexington, vintage photos of historic coronations, how a wild river became a national park, and how Chien-Shiung Wu changed the laws of physics. There are also articles on travel, history, culture, and animals."}}}'}]
"""
